coding_practice.title: Global and Local Inversions
coding_practice.description:
You are given an integer array nums of length n which represents a permutation of all the integers in the range [0, n - 1].

The number of global inversions is the number of the different pairs (i, j) where:

0 <= i < j < n
nums[i] > nums[j]

The number of local inversions is the number of indices i where:

0 <= i < n - 1
nums[i] > nums[i + 1]

Return true if the number of global inversions is equal to the number of local inversions.

examples.explanation: There is 1 global inversion and 1 local inversion.
There are 2 global inversions and 1 local inversion.

coding_practice.constraints:
n == nums.length
1 <= n <= 10^5
0 <= nums[i] < n
All the integers of nums are unique.
nums is a permutation of all the numbers in the range [0, n - 1].
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 觀察題目可知，若任何 nums[i] > nums[i+2]，則會產生非局部的全域逆序。
2. 初始化 max_val = nums[0]，遍歷到倒數第三個元素。
3. 若 max_val > nums[i+2]，返回 False，否則更新 max_val。
4. 遍歷結束仍未出現，返回 True，表示全域逆序等於局部逆序。
